item.title: Rubbish and broken masonry on the ground, 21st July
item.description:
Broken tiles and bricks have been here on the ground for almost 2 years. Neither the cleaners or the ground staff want to take responsibility, I need to have removed. Have previously reported, but nothing has been done about it. Sick of seeing the mess!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chatham Place, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped/Abandoned Trailer, 21st July
item.description:
Reported twice this year by my neighbours. Abandoned trailer parked outside number 127/129 Norfolk Crescent. As noted before will have no tax, no mot, no insurance or a registered keeper. Appears to now have a number plate stuck on! However, should still not be left on highway as a permanent feature (been parked there years). Please could this Dumped/Abandoned Trailer be removed. I have witnessed several near misses by road users. Why has this not been dealt with?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 151, Norfolk Crescent, Longlands, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping taken place on French Place, 21st July
item.description:
On French Place there is a lot of bins left outside which is now collecting more bins - please could you kindly remove. Directly above the bins people have ignored 'no fly tipping' sign and done it anyway

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): French Place, Hackney, London

item.title: Cleaning not done on Monday, 21st July
item.description:

item.title: Over grown brambles and ivy at 235Riverdale Road is grown into the cemetery wall and it is crumbling away., 21st July
item.description:
This wall and the weeds in the neighbours garden has been an ongoing problem for years . Orbit housing have said they are not responsible for the wall. But they will be issuing letter to the Tennant to clear overgrown brambles and ivy as it is encroaching on neighbouring property.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Riverdale Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Greenery obscuring sign, 21st July
item.description:
This lunch time tree surgeons kindly cleared the greenery covering a sign for a sharp bend. As you can see within a few feet there is a sign for a bend for cars coming in the opposite direction that is almost completely covered I spoke to the tree surgeons who said they had been requested to clear the one sign and the light that had been covered. It would have made sense for them to cut back the greenery from the sign in the other direction too. The tree surgeons were very polite but said they were unable to cut the greenery without a specific request There have been accidents in the past due to both signs being covered please could you arrange for the greenery overgrowing the second sign to be cleared

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ravensbourne Avenue, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet
